verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of Babylon,<WH894> which Isaiah<WH3470> the son<WH1121> of Amoz<WH531> saw:<WH2372>

Set up<WH5375> a banner<WH5251> on the bare<WH8192> mountain!<WH2022> Lift up<WH7311> your voice<WH6963> to them!<WH5130> Wave your hand,<WH3027> that they may go<WH935> into the gates<WH6607> of the nobles.<WH5081>
I have commanded<WH6680> my consecrated ones;<WH6942> yes,<WH7121> I have called my mighty men<WH1368> for my anger,<WH639> even my proudly<WH1346> exulting ones.<WH5947>

The noise<WH6963> of a multitude<WH1995> is in the mountains,<WH2022> as<WH1823> of a great<WH7227> people;<WH5971> the noise<WH6963> of an uproar<WH7588> of the kingdoms<WH4467> of the nations<WH1471> gathered together!<WH622> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> is mustering<WH6485> the army<WH6635> for the battle.<WH4421>

They come<WH935> from a far<WH4801> country,<WH776> from the uttermost<WH7097> part of heaven,<WH8064> even Yahweh,<WH3068> and the weapons<WH3627> of his indignation,<WH2195> to destroy<WH2254> the whole land.<WH776>
Wail;<WH3213> for the day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068> is at hand!<WH7138> It will come<WH935> as destruction<WH7701> from the Almighty.<WH7706>
Therefore all hands<WH3027> will be feeble,<WH7503> and everyone<WH582>'s heart<WH3824> will melt.<WH7503>

They will be dismayed.<WH926> Pangs<WH6735> and sorrows<WH2256> will seize<WH270> them.<WH2342> They will be in pain like a woman in labor.<WH3205> They will look in amazement<WH8539> one<WH376> at another.<WH7453> Their faces<WH6440> will be faces of flame.<WH6440>

Behold,<WH3117> the day of Yahweh<WH3068> comes,<WH935> cruel,<WH394> with wrath<WH5678> and fierce<WH2740> anger;<WH639> to make<WH7760> the land<WH776> a desolation,<WH8047> and to destroy<WH8045> its sinners out of it.<WH2400>

For the stars<WH3556> of the sky<WH8064> and its constellations<WH3685> will not give<WH1984> their light.<WH216> The sun<WH8121> will be darkened<WH2821> in its going forth,<WH3318> and the moon<WH3394> will not cause its light<WH216> to shine.<WH5050>

I will punish<WH6485> the world<WH8398> for their evil,<WH7451> and the wicked<WH7563> for their iniquity.<WH5771> I will cause the arrogance<WH1347> of the proud<WH2086> to cease,<WH7673> and will humble<WH8213> the haughtiness<WH1346> of the terrible.<WH6184>
I will make people<WH582> more rare<WH3365> than fine gold,<WH6337> even a person<WH120> than the pure gold<WH3800> of Ophir.<WH211>

Therefore I will make the heavens<WH8064> tremble,<WH7264> and the earth<WH776> will be shaken<WH7493> out of its place<WH4725> in the wrath<WH5678> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> and in the day<WH3117> of his fierce<WH2740> anger.<WH639>

It will happen that like a hunted<WH5080> gazelle,<WH6643> and like sheep<WH6629> that no one<WH376> gathers,<WH6908> they will each turn<WH6437> to their own people,<WH5971> and will each<WH376> flee<WH5127> to their own land.<WH776>
Everyone who is found<WH4672> will be thrust through.<WH1856> Everyone who is captured<WH5595> will fall<WH5307> by the sword.<WH2719>
Their infants<WH5768> also will be dashed in pieces<WH7376> before their eyes.<WH5869> Their houses<WH1004> will be ransacked,<WH8155> and their wives<WH802> raped.<WH7901>
Behold,<WH5782> I will stir up the Medes<WH4074> against them,<WH2803> who will not value silver,<WH3701> and as for gold,<WH2091> they will not delight in it.<WH2654>

Their bows<WH7198> will dash<WH7376> the young men<WH5288> in pieces;<WH7376> and they shall have no pity<WH7355> on the fruit<WH6529> of the womb.<WH990> Their eyes<WH5869> will not spare<WH2347> children.<WH1121>
Babylon,<WH894> the glory<WH6643> of kingdoms,<WH4467> the beauty<WH8597> of the Chaldeans<WH3778>' pride,<WH1347> will be like when God<WH430> overthrew<WH4114> Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah.<WH6017>

It will never<WH5331> be inhabited,<WH3427> neither will it be lived<WH7931> in from generation<WH1755> to generation.<WH1755> The Arabian<WH6163> will not pitch a tent<WH167> there,<WH7462> neither will shepherds make their flocks lie down there.<WH7257>

But wild animals of the desert<WH6728> will lie<WH7257> there,<WH1004> and their houses will be full<WH4390> of jackals.<WH255> Ostriches<WH1323> will dwell<WH7931> there,<WH8163> and wild goats will frolic there.<WH7540>

Wolves<WH338> will cry<WH6030> in their castles,<WH490> and jackals<WH8577> in the pleasant<WH6027> palaces.<WH1964> Her time<WH6256> is near<WH7138> to come,<WH935> and her days<WH3117> will not be prolonged.<WH4900>
